text: Willelm king gret ealle mine bisceopes and mine eorles and mine gerefan and ealle mine thegenas on tham sciran Laenfranc ærcebiscop and se hired æt Christes cyrucan on Cantuareberi habbath land in frendlice, and ic kyde eow that ic habbe heom geunnen that hi beon heore sace and socne wurthe on strande and on streme, on wudan and on feldan, tolnes and teames, grithbruces and hamsocne, forstealles and infangenstheoves and flemena fyrmithe over heora agene menn binnan burgan and butan swa full and swa furth swa mene agene wicneras hit secan scolden and over Christes cyrucan and over swa fela thegena swa ic heom to gelæte habbe, and ic nelle that æni mann æni thing thær onteo buton hi and heora wicneras tham hi hit betoecan syllath, ne Frencise ne Englise, for than thingan the ic habbe thær gerilica Christe forgivene minre saule to ecere alysednesse eal swa Eadward king munoei oer dyde and ic nelle gethavian that ani thir to brece be minun freondscipe.
